alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 9:14PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge, Wilcox and Telfair Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Abbeville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Flooding of farm lands, timber lands, and access roads will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM EDT Sunday was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
